title: (x) Dannii Minogue website geometric sans - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/Alternates {Tiff}
content:
i’d really, really love to know what font is used on the front page of this link: [http://www.danniimusic.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013623/http:/www.danniimusic.com/ "http://www.danniimusic.com/")

my best guess is it is some version of Avant Garde with slanted characters.

thanks in advance!  
Dr. Theopolis

 [‹ (x) I.D. magazine body copy - Coranto {Benjamin Shaykin}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20156 "Go to previous forum topic") [Stranglers Logo font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013623/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20123 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DocTheop
